item.title: LeetCode[185] Department Top Three Salaries
item.description: Question The Employee table holds all employees. Every employee has an Id, and there is also a column for the department Id. +----+-------+--------+--------------+ | Id | Name | Salary | DepartmentId | +----+-------+--------+--------------+ | 1 | Joe | 85000 | 1 | | 2 | Henry | 80000 | 2 | | 3 | Sam | 60000 | 2 | | 4 | Max | 90000 | 1 | | 5 | Janet | 69000 | 1 | | 6 | Randy | 85000 | 1 | | 7 | Will | 70000 | 1 | +----+-------+--------+--------------+ The Department table holds all departments of the company.
